title: LITTLE EARTH
detail: Little Earth presents charming 2 and 3 BHK homes that merge comfort with functionality. These thoughtfully designed residences offer spacious living areas, modern finishes, and practical layouts. Enjoy features like well-equipped kitchens, ample storage, and energy-efficient fixtures. At Little Earth, every home is crafted to enhance your daily living experience, providing a cozy retreat that caters to both relaxation and convenience.
developer_detail: Kolte-Patil Developers Ltd. is a renowned real estate developer with a strong presence in Pune, Bangalore, and Mumbai. Established in 1991 and headquartered in Pune, the company is listed on both the National Stock Exchange (NSE) and the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). With over three decades of experience, Kolte-Patil has earned a reputation for delivering high-quality residential and commercial projects. They have a diverse portfolio that includes integrated townships, residential complexes, commercial spaces, and IT parks.
city_description: Kiwale-Mamurdi Road represents the perfect blend of modernity and convenience, making it an ideal choice for real estate investments. Whether you are looking for a place to call home or seeking a lucrative commercial venture, this location offers unparalleled opportunities for growth and prosperity. Invest in Kiwale-Mamurdi Road today and be part of a thriving future.
